InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

InstalledItem.Name: Charger
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

The Aegis Charger has powered military fighters for generations. Tried and tested in the most demanding of situations, the Charger can handle sudden or sustained power draws with ease.

InstalledItem.Name: SonicLite
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Constructed from the ground up to minimize your heat signature, Tyler Design’s SonicLite power plant has gained a following among pilots who appreciate a subtler approach.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Drift
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RAMP Corporation 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Built to keep heat and signature levels low, the Drift quantum drive from RAMP Corporation helps to minimize emissions generated while spooling.

InstalledItem.Name: Explorer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

InstalledItem.Name: Shimmer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: Shimmer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: TroMag Burst Generator
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: MaxOx
Item Type: Burst Generator
Size: 1
Damage Type: EMP

The TroMag from MaxOx is a well-designed and reliable EMP-focused burst generator. Its popularity has risen over the years as pilots look for alternatives to Behring’s REP-8. The TroMag boasts a faster charge time than their main competitor but has a smaller effective radius, leaving pilots to decide whether they prefer speed or size.
